title: Tensai Rekinjutsushi Wa Kimama Ni Tabi Suru
alternative_title: 天才錬金術師は気ままに旅する　～５００年後の世界で目覚めた世界最高の元宮廷錬金術師、ポーション作りで聖女さま扱いされる～ ; 天才錬金術師は気ままに旅する
status: 天才錬金術師は気ままに旅する　～５００年後の世界で目覚めた世界最高の元宮廷錬金術師、ポーション作りで聖女さま扱いされる～ ; 天才錬金術師は気ままに旅する
description:
Description :
        The youngest girl ever to become a court alchemist, Seyi, was busy with hard work every day. One day, the royal city was suddenly attacked by a horde of monsters, she woke up 500 years later. The city had already been destroyed, and Seyi, freed from her hard work, was determined to travel through a completely changed world. She was supposed to travel freely, but her potion-making skills quickly become the talk of the town?!The genius alchemist's leisurely, slow-life journey begins!(from mangaupdates)
